channel.title: [PI] Deimos - looking for testers
channel.description:
[url=http://www.greekmythology.com/Other_Gods/Deimos/deimos.html]Deimos[/url] was a god in Greek mythology, personification of terror. [size=8pt]Previous work: [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,631858.0.html]Allstar Reborn[/url].[/size]
I started this project a while back, wanting to make an enjoyable PI. It's got a lot of standard PI Content, and some custom content. I'm currently looking for a few people to test it out, help me with finding & fixing bugs, suggest ideas etc.
I also hope to meet some chill people (maybe a website dev), and hopefully have Deimos go public eventually.
Contact my skype for details: alex.isnotastalker
[spoiler=Update Log.txt] - Adjustments to reduce the ugliness of the source - Command modifications - Cleaned up process() - New torva added (stronger) - Changed some packaging - Added npc facing - Adjusted thieving - Added achievement tab - Added 100m, 1b, 2b tokens, changed shops - Changed around entire quest tab interface to be more compact/clean - Changed loyalty titles - Removed NPC Clipping due to memory leak - Lots of stability improvements - Improved changing loyalty titles through Robgob's CP - Readded NPC Clipping via map_index - Started work on adding colored whip effects - Fixed prayer draining - Changed starter - bug fixes/whip effects - Added more bosses with drops - Added Sell/Buy X - Improved automated server messages - Improved managing player rights through Robgob's CP - Removed player owned shops as they're unnecesarry - Implemented title saving, so you can easily switch between titles (loyalty titles) - Removed lottery system - Auto-saves changed to be player-specific - Moved donor zone/added donor shop - Removed some high level items from coin shops - Changed NPC placement in Edge - Edits to shops - Change to PvP point rewards - Added boss points/boss point shop (no items yet) - Removed random task assignment from Duradel - Made shop items unlimited - Redid Crystal key chest rewards / added keys as an NPC Drop - Changed boss point shop to second option for Captain Cain (PvP Point shop) - Redid melee gear shop - Fixed a bug where the player would not be able to buy 1gp items - Removed PK'ing skill - Added stronger gear into the PvP Point shop - Made Player titles rely on Loyalty points (points earned through NPC Kills) - Made it easier to change title cost - Boss kills now reward 1-5 Loyalty Points - Bonus Loyalty points are now recieved at NPC Kill intervals (50, 100, 250, 500, 750, 1000) - 1 in 10 chance to recieve a Loyalty Point from any NPC - Command, object & button spam prevention - Customized some NPC Definitions - Fixed donators being able to bank in wild - Added prestige system base (20 prestiges, prestige points, saving) - Reduced XP Rates of melee, range & magic - Completed All Prestige Rewards: Prestige title Random weapon (gives chaotics or ags, will add more weaponss) Random gear (gives arma,bandos,torva,virtus, or pernix, may change rewards) Random rare Prestige Master title (red title, and allowed to yell when title equipped) - Added upgraded Torva to Ranndom Rare reward - Added stonger gear into the Crystal Chest/Adjusted rates for some items - Added Steadfast, glaiven and ragefire boots into boss point store (40 points ea) - Added a Save Event system to save players more often w/o spam - Added NPC kill save event (saves 30 seconds after first kill, 2 minutes later your next kill will re-start the event) - Added economy reset - Stackable shop items no longer have a "1" above them - Shortened level up code - Fixed TONS of false packet bugs (thanks to zeropoint) - No longer recieve loyalty rewards from killing NPCs besides bosses - Now recieve loyalty points every ~15 min (reward increases for longer playtime) - Prestiged players can yell - Prevent AFK players from getting loyalty points - Changed Lamp EXP reward [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Features]- Many standard PI Features - Full Prestige system (20 Prestiges, titles, rewards) - Simpler, more organized feel to the Server (help with making it server-wide!) - Both PvP and PvM are encouraged. - Combat XP Rates are fairly difficult for PI - Loyalty Point system based on NPC/Boss Kills, Prestiging & time played - Boss Point system (no items in shop, need people to suggest stuff) [/spoiler]
[spoiler=Media] [IMG]http://i.gyazo.com/11776a5837b3ee4fe9d604db489cbf86.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/d23a12f8ddf5f8684fd6273ec442ecc9.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/7628cb1f1427941d1515cf5f19db3bed.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/0dcaa4cce8bba17189cfe8f73a0e479c.png[/img] [/spoiler]

item.title: [PI] Deimos - looking for testers
item.dc:creator: @TheLetterQArousesMe TheLetterQArousesMe
item.description:
@TheLetterQArousesMe wrote:

Deimos was a god in Greek mythology, personification of terror.
[size=8pt]Previous work: Allstar Reborn.[/size]

I started this project a while back, wanting to make an enjoyable PI.
It’s got a lot of standard PI Content, and some custom content. I’m currently looking for a few
people to test it out, help me with finding & fixing bugs, suggest ideas etc.

I also hope to meet some chill people (maybe a website dev), and hopefully have Deimos go public eventually.

Contact my skype for details: alex.isnotastalker

[spoiler=Update Log.txt]

  • Adjustments to reduce the ugliness of the source
  • Command modifications
  • Cleaned up process()
  • New torva added (stronger)
  • Changed some packaging
  • Added npc facing
  • Adjusted thieving
  • Added achievement tab
  • Added 100m, 1b, 2b tokens, changed shops
  • Changed around entire quest tab interface to be more compact/clean
  • Changed loyalty titles
  • Removed NPC Clipping due to memory leak
  • Lots of stability improvements
  • Improved changing loyalty titles through Robgob’s CP
  • Readded NPC Clipping via map_index
  • Started work on adding colored whip effects
  • Fixed prayer draining
  • Changed starter
  • bug fixes/whip effects
  • Added more bosses with drops
  • Added Sell/Buy X
  • Improved automated server messages
  • Improved managing player rights through Robgob’s CP
  • Removed player owned shops as they’re unnecesarry
  • Implemented title saving, so you can easily switch between titles (loyalty titles)
  • Removed lottery system
  • Auto-saves changed to be player-specific
  • Moved donor zone/added donor shop
  • Removed some high level items from coin shops
  • Changed NPC placement in Edge
  • Edits to shops
  • Change to PvP point rewards
  • Added boss points/boss point shop (no items yet)
  • Removed random task assignment from Duradel
  • Made shop items unlimited
  • Redid Crystal key chest rewards / added keys as an NPC Drop
  • Changed boss point shop to second option for Captain Cain (PvP Point shop)
  • Redid melee gear shop
  • Fixed a bug where the player would not be able to buy 1gp items
  • Removed PK’ing skill
  • Added stronger gear into the PvP Point shop
  • Made Player titles rely on Loyalty points (points earned through NPC Kills)
  • Made it easier to change title cost
  • Boss kills now reward 1-5 Loyalty Points
  • Bonus Loyalty points are now recieved at NPC Kill intervals (50, 100, 250, 500, 750, 1000)
  • 1 in 10 chance to recieve a Loyalty Point from any NPC
  • Command, object & button spam prevention
  • Customized some NPC Definitions
  • Fixed donators being able to bank in wild
  • Added prestige system base (20 prestiges, prestige points, saving)
  • Reduced XP Rates of melee, range & magic
  • Completed All Prestige Rewards:
    Prestige title
    Random weapon (gives chaotics or ags, will add more weaponss)
    Random gear (gives arma,bandos,torva,virtus, or pernix, may change rewards)
    Random rare
    Prestige Master title (red title, and allowed to yell when title equipped)
  • Added upgraded Torva to Ranndom Rare reward
  • Added stonger gear into the Crystal Chest/Adjusted rates for some items
  • Added Steadfast, glaiven and ragefire boots into boss point store (40 points ea)
  • Added a Save Event system to save players more often w/o spam
  • Added NPC kill save event (saves 30 seconds after first kill, 2 minutes later your next kill will re-start the event)
  • Added economy reset
  • Stackable shop items no longer have a “1” above them
  • Shortened level up code
  • Fixed TONS of false packet bugs (thanks to zeropoint)
  • No longer recieve loyalty rewards from killing NPCs besides bosses
  • Now recieve loyalty points every ~15 min (reward increases for longer playtime)
  • Prestiged players can yell
  • Prevent AFK players from getting loyalty points
  • Changed Lamp EXP reward
    [/spoiler]

[spoiler=Features]- Many standard PI Features

  • Full Prestige system (20 Prestiges, titles, rewards)
  • Simpler, more organized feel to the Server (help with making it server-wide!)
  • Both PvP and PvM are encouraged.
  • Combat XP Rates are fairly difficult for PI
  • Loyalty Point system based on NPC/Boss Kills, Prestiging & time played
  • Boss Point system (no items in shop, need people to suggest stuff)
    [/spoiler]

[spoiler=Media]




[/spoiler]
